name: Ultimate "Boy Meets World" Quiz, Perhaps | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What grade do Cory, Shawn, and Topanga start in the first season?
questions.explanation:
Sixth.

	The first season takes place in sixth grade, but they are seniors by the fifth season.  They are either very good students or time does not exist at John Adams High School.

questions.text: What is Jack's relationship to Shawn?
questions.explanation:
Half-brother.

	Chet Hunter is the father of both, but Jack's mother is rich and Shawn lives in a trailer park.

questions.text: In what season do Cory and Topanga consummate their relationship?
questions.explanation:
Season 7.

	In season 7, the final season, Cory and Topanga finally have sex.  They talk about it a lot in seasons 5 & 6, and season 8 does not exist.

questions.text: Why does Shawn move in with Mr. Turner?
questions.correct: His father leaves to find his mother
options: His father leaves for another woman
questions.explanation:
His father leaves to find his mother.

	Shawn's father chases across the country after his wife, leaving Shawn to bunk with his teacher.  How awkward.

questions.text: When Cory goes on his senior year ski trip, Topanga is jealous of his relationship with Lauren.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Topanga is such a trusting girlfriend, that even though Cory spends so much time with Lauren, she is not jealous.  Only after she finds the letter that Lauren gave to Cory does she begin questioning his fidelity.

questions.text: Who does Shawn live with during his senior year of high school?
questions.explanation:
Jack and Eric.

	Chet tells Shawn to live with his long lost brother now that they're reunited.  Eric's there also.  How awkward.

questions.text: At the end of the show Mr. Feeny retires.
questions.explanation:
False.

	He retires at the end of the fifth season, but then resumes teaching.  Like Michael Jordan.

wrestler.

	A helpful quiz taker says: "Fankie 'Vader' Stechino SR. Has wrestled on WCW/NWA Clash of the Champions, WWE Raw, WWF Shotgun Saturday Night, WCW Pay-Per-View, WWF Superstars, WCW Saturday Night."

questions.text: What does Topanga want to be after graduation?
questions.explanation:
Lawyer.

	Topanga's interviewing for an internship at a law firm.

questions.text: Where do Cory and Topanga move to at the end of show?
questions.explanation:
New York, NY.

	They move to New York to turn their hopes and dreams into reality.  Good luck, you two.
